title: Massage for Health
creator_credit: Johanna Demetrakas, Steven Adams and Healing Arts Home Video
brief_description: You can take the fitness of your mind and body into your own hands with “Massage for Health”. You can combat stress, enhance your physical beauty, or improve your athletic performance. They’ll cover every aspect of massage as they cover virtually every inch of your body. You’ll learn the safe, and correct way to prepare for, and give, and receive massage. With a little practice this video will give you all you need to experience new levels of strength, relaxation and well being.
